rukus.text: (E'i grantha) parama karaunamaya parama dayalu sattara taraphara paraa aratirna
Enekuraa ekhana kitaba, yara ayatasamuha jnani sampradayara babe bisadabharae barnana karaa haiche, kora'anaraupe arabi bhasata
Susambadadata arau satarkakarai. Tathapi'o sihamtara sarahabhage'i mukha ghuraa'i laiche. Seye sihamte nusuniba

Arau sihamte kaya, ‘tumi yara prati amaka ahbana karai acha se'i bisaye amara antarata ararana paraiche, arau amara kanata ache badhirata lagate amara arau tomalokara majata ache parda; seye tumi tomara kama karaa, niscaya ami amara kama karaima’

Koraa, ‘ma'i kerala tomalokara darae'i ejana manuha, mora prati ahi karaa haya ye, tomalokara ilaha kerala ejana ilaha. Eteke tomaloke te'omra prati drrhata aralambana karaa arau te'omra ocarate'i ksama praarthana karaa’. Arau durbhoga musbaraikasakalara babe
yisakale yakata pradana nakarae sihamte'i akhiraata asbikarakarai
Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche, te'omlokara babe ache nirabicchinna puraskara
